channel.title: Official mw3 tournament [xbox]
channel.description:
I'm going to start a tournament on mw3. It will be a 1v1 against a random moparscape member. Thread is in progress. I wanna see if it gets anywhere first
Prize: option 1: 3 month xbl card. Option 2: 10m rsgp
Just leave a comment with ur xbl gamer tag
First person to 50 kills wins. And moves on to the next round.
Entries: 1. GT: vmanlyman 2: Eskimo twiggy

item.title: Official mw3 tournament [xbox]
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:4, topic:431773”]I don’t like call of duty, but I’ve been pretty bored of other games lately. Once you schedule a time and get some other players to join message me. (My Dad and brother’s usually play Call of Duty, not me. Hence the uber low K/D).

GT: LifeLongCobra

EDIT: Major fail on my part. v Manlyman was my GT, but my brothers did something to get it banned. LifeLongCobra is mine now.[/quote]
We need more people!

Read full topic
